name: Two Roads
description:
Ludum Dare 13 had the theme of "Roads".  To avoid the cliche driving game concept, I decided to create something very loosely based on Robert Frost's poem 'The Road Not Taken'.  It's about roads, right? So, give it a go!  It's an interactive poem.  The challenge was in making it so that whatever path you took, it would always continue to rhyme and have proper meter.  The end result is very short and simple, but you will laugh!

* Full narration by famed spoken word artist Sir Argyle Potsworthy

* Two dogs and a bear

* Flying pencil action

* Photos of my backyard
